channel.title: Need Help With A Command

item.title: Need Help With A Command
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“pobdol, post:1, topic:379099”]Hello everyone I made a command where you get xp in every skill but I wanna make it so you can only do it once heres the command below & it has no errors =]

Command:

if(command.startsWith("starter")&& playerRights >= 0){ //Voule Command Generator addSkillXP(55000, 0); addSkillXP(55000, 1); addSkillXP(55000, 2); addSkillXP(55000, 3); addSkillXP(55000, 4); addSkillXP(55000, 5); addSkillXP(55000, 6); addSkillXP(55000, 7); addSkillXP(55000, 8); addSkillXP(55000, 9); addSkillXP(55000, 10); addSkillXP(55000, 11); addSkillXP(55000, 12); addSkillXP(55000, 13); addSkillXP(55000, 14); addSkillXP(15000000, 15); addSkillXP(55000, 16); addSkillXP(55000, 17); addSkillXP(55000, 18); addSkillXP(15000000, 19); addSkillXP(55000, 20); addSkillXP(55000, 21); sM("You Have Just Used Starter To Get Started. Enjoy!"); }[/quote]

Make a new token called starterEXP, then use this code instead.

if(command.startsWith("starter")&& playerRights >= 0 && starterEXP == 0){ addSkillXP(55000, 0); addSkillXP(55000, 1); addSkillXP(55000, 2); addSkillXP(55000, 3); addSkillXP(55000, 4); addSkillXP(55000, 5); addSkillXP(55000, 6); addSkillXP(55000, 7); addSkillXP(55000, 8); addSkillXP(55000, 9); addSkillXP(55000, 10); addSkillXP(55000, 11); addSkillXP(55000, 12); addSkillXP(55000, 13); addSkillXP(55000, 14); addSkillXP(15000000, 15); addSkillXP(55000, 16); addSkillXP(55000, 17); addSkillXP(55000, 18); addSkillXP(15000000, 19); addSkillXP(55000, 20); addSkillXP(55000, 21); starterEXP = 1; sM("You Have Just Used Starter To Get Started. Enjoy!"); }

Btw, don’t use command generators, there gay.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help With A Command
item.dc:creator: @pobdol pobdol
item.description:
@pobdol wrote:

Hello everyone I made a command where you get xp in every skill but I wanna make it so you can only do it once heres the command below & it has no errors =]

Command:

if(command.startsWith("starter")&& playerRights >= 0){ //Voule Command Generator addSkillXP(55000, 0); addSkillXP(55000, 1); addSkillXP(55000, 2); addSkillXP(55000, 3); addSkillXP(55000, 4); addSkillXP(55000, 5); addSkillXP(55000, 6); addSkillXP(55000, 7); addSkillXP(55000, 8); addSkillXP(55000, 9); addSkillXP(55000, 10); addSkillXP(55000, 11); addSkillXP(55000, 12); addSkillXP(55000, 13); addSkillXP(55000, 14); addSkillXP(15000000, 15); addSkillXP(55000, 16); addSkillXP(55000, 17); addSkillXP(55000, 18); addSkillXP(15000000, 19); addSkillXP(55000, 20); addSkillXP(55000, 21); sM("You Have Just Used Starter To Get Started. Enjoy!"); }
